title: Organo NHC catalyzed aqueous synthesis of 4β-isoxazole-podophyllotoxins: in vitro anticancer, caspase activation, tubulin polymerization inhibition and molecular docking studies
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23574-23582
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04297B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Rajkumar Nagavath, Murali Krishna Thupurani, Vinitha Badithapuram, Ravinder Manchal, Chandra Sekhar Vasam, Narasimha Swamy Thirukovela
We present, for the first time, the organo-N-heterocyclic carbene (NHC) catalyzed 1,3-dipolar cycloaddition of 4β-O-propargyl podophyllotoxin (1) with nitrile oxides to afford 4β-isoxazolepodophyllotoxin hybrids (6a–n) in aqueous-organic media.
